name: Axis Mundi
description:
A brand new shopping mall has been disturbed by a number of hauntings. You, a freelancing ghost photographer, is called to investigate the location. The location is home to a number of entities, requiring you to travel through spectral memories and uncover the roots of its darkest moments.

  • Aesthetic inspired by rural Sweden and late 90s PC games.
  • Detailed locations to explore.
  • Camera-based ghost hunting.
  • Spatial puzzle solving.
  • A look into Scandinavian folklore.
